<title level="1" right="Trait">[Double Barrel](/Traits.aspx?ID=403)</title>

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 232 <sup>2.0</sup>

This weapon has two barrels that are each loaded separately. You can fire both barrels of a double barrel weapon in a single Strike to increase the weapon damage die by one step. If the weapon has the [fatal](/Traits.aspx?ID=178) trait, this increases the fatal die by one step.
name: Double Barrel
